item.title: Changes to the Update Manager
item.description: I recently pushed some changes to the update manager that users and developers should be aware of. The primary points of concern are as follows:

item.title: PolicyKit warnings; unable to manage services, restart system, or update packages
item.description: This announcement is an effort to get ahead of a coming change that will certainly result in issues. PR #346 has been merged, and with it are some changes to Moonraker's default behavior.
